# üîº Batch project editor

<!--Badges-->

[![License of üîº Batch project editor](https://img.shields.io/github/license/hejny/batch-project-editor.svg?style=flat)](https://github.com/hejny/batch-project-editor/blob/main/LICENSE)

<!--/Badges-->

Edits and commits changes to multiple projects automatically. It is designed for for [my @hejny`s](https://github.com/hejny?tab=repositories) projects management workflow. Feel free to fork and use it for yourself.
